scripts.build: tsc -p jsconfig.json && dts-bundle-generator --no-banner --out-file index.d.ts --project jsconfig.json src/style.js 2> /dev/null || true
scripts.strip: sed -i'' -E -e 's/export type Params = Params;//' -e 's/export type PlainObject = PlainObject;//' -e 's/export type StylesObject = StylesObject;//' -e 's/`@media \$\{string}`/"@media ${string}"/' -e 's/`\$\{number}%`/"${number}%"/' -e 's/\\t/  /g' -e 's/ \\* /  /' -e 's/ *[@]typedef [{]import.*//' -e 's/\\/[*][*]/\\n\\n\\/**/' -e 's/[*]\\//*\\/\\n/' -e 's/export/\\nexport/' -e 's/export \{};//' index.d.ts && sed -i'' -E -e '/^$/N;/^\\n$/D' index.d.ts && prettier-eslint --parser "typescript" --semi --write index.d.ts && sed -i'' -E -e 's/      \\/[*][*]/  \\/**/' -e 's/\"@media \$\{string}\"/`@media ${string}`/' -e 's/\"\$\{number}%\"/`${number}%`/' index.d.ts || true
